issue.title: [Rust] Support stable Rust
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6717](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6717). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm creating this issue to track all the stories we need to implement to be able to use stable Rust.
 \* Specialization

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6717?focusedCommentId=17249947) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Update: As of Dec 2020 Arrow will work with stable Rust by default. If we enable the `simd` features, nightly rust is still required

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6717?focusedCommentId=17259622) by Qingyou Meng (mqy):*
The latest `rustfmt` available on my local machine is:

```

$ rustfmt +nightly --version

rustfmt 1.4.30-nightly (acd94866 **2020-12-20**)

```
